channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- 2800C OptixPanel™ Compact
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- 2800C OptixPanel™ Compact

item.title: CVE-2024-8533|2024-09-12T20:58:17.171Z -- rockwell%20automation -- 2800c%20optixpanel%E2%84%A2%20compact
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability exists in the Rockwell Automation affected products. The vulnerability occurs due to improper default file permissions allowing users to exfiltrate credentials and escalate privileges.
